content.prompt: In the United Kingdom, the government has maintained a free market system. In China, there has been a transition from a socialist model to a mixed system with elements of a free market model over the past few decades. Which of the following is the outcome of these policies?

choices.label: The promotion of free market policies has empowered socialist groups and led to gains in national elections.
Increased competition has led to economic development in both countries, and the growth rates in China have been very high in recent decades.
In both countries, privatization policies have destabilized the dominant party system.
Political support for nationalist groups who oppose globalist economic policies and support strengthening the national culture has been undermined.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.2: Political Responses to Global Market Forces

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the implications of the similarities and differences between countries with different political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
